Sign In Default Button Success Button Alert Button Info Button

About

First button is a sign in button is a 'sign' in button and should be used to submit login forms upon signing into the web site.
The second button is a default button and should be used in general scenarios throughout the website.
The third button is the Success/Positive button and should be used when accepting something presented by the site (e.g terms and conditions)
The fourth button is a warning button and should be used in conjuction with the Success/Positive button and the Alert/Negative button.
The fifth button is the alert/negative button and should be used for things such as a decline terms and conditions.
The final button is the info button and should be used where the to allow the user to gather more infomation on content or an element. Can also be used as a 'help' button.
